name: Promotion Class: Vandal
description:
Role: Melee Control

A master of shadows who believes the key to winning is controlling targets so they never have a chance.

Stat Adjustments:
Poison Damage +30%
Hard Crowd Control +18%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Dagger Mastery
Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Kidney Shot: Now does additional damage to Stunned targets.
In The Zone: Now has a chance to refund pips on attacks.
Backstab: Now adds Suppress.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Cutthroat promotion class and prevents access to the Blackguard and Cutthroat promotion classes.
